WorkItem.ClosedComment: I haven't seen this in a long time and there have been no vote ups or other comments in months
WorkItem.Description:
I'm editing a Paladin I loaded from Armory, which originally had two points in "Divine Guardian". I wanted to do a total spec change, so began shift-clicking various talent points to remove them. I was able to remove all talent points, save for two - those in "Divine Guardian". I was even able to remove the pre-req talent, "Divine Sacrifice" without concern - and all other Prot talents. I put them back in, tried to remove it again, couldn't. Pretty much, those two points are just 'stuck' for some reason. Everything else works fine.
Â 
Mac, Standalone.

Comments.Message: I saw this happen a couple times, it gets stuck thinking it's a prereq for something else. Set your talents to a saved spec of Untalented (should be in there) and that should clear the issue.

I have had this happen in Rawr2 recently, DPSWarr module, where the Arms talent Incite was not allowing right-click removal, even when all points in Deep Wounds were removed (this was when I was investigating the "let's give OP a 174s GCD" issue =D).  No matter how I played with it, the only way to clear it was to select the preset 0/0/0 spec and start with a fresh slate.
